oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Computational challenges in deriving dairy cows' action patterns from accelerometer data
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hämäläinen, W.
Martiskainen, P.
Järvinen, M.
Skön, J.-P.
Tiirikainen, J.
Kolehmainen, M.
Mononen, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We describe an attempt to build a computational model for deriving dairy cows' action patterns automatically from accelerometer data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hämäläinen, W.; Martiskainen, P.; Järvinen, M.; Skön, J.-P.; Tiirikainen, J.; Kolehmainen, M. and Mononen, J. (2010) Computational challenges in deriving dairy cows' action patterns from accelerometer data. In: Proceedings of the 22nd Nordic symposium of the International Society for Applied Ethology, Finnish Society for Applied Ethology, p. 18.
